UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile within the ChatPay application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

Debt.title: Debt
Debt.description: Represents a debt owed by the user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Debt entity.

name.description: The name of the debt (e.g., Credit Card, Loan).

amount.description: The total amount of the debt.

interestRate.description: The interest rate of the debt.

minimumPayment.description: The minimum payment required for the debt.

Obligation.title: Obligation
Obligation.description: Represents a financial obligation or bill.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Obligation entity.

name.description: The name of the obligation (e.g., Rent, Utilities).

dueDate.description: The date the obligation is due.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Budget entity.

name.description: The name of the budget (e.g., Monthly Budget).

startDate.description: The start date of the budget.

endDate.description: The end date of the budget.

BudgetItem.title: BudgetItem
BudgetItem.description: Represents an item within a budget (e.g., Groceries, Entertainment).

id.description: Unique identifier for the BudgetItem entity.

name.description: The name of the budget item.

amount.description: The allocated amount for the budget item.

id.description: Unique identifier for the BudgetCategory entity.

allocated.description: The amount allocated to this category.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Investment entity.

name.description: The name of the investment (e.g., Stock, Bond).

type.description: The type of investment (e.g., Stock, Bond, Mutual Fund).

purchasePrice.description: The price at which the investment was purchased.

currentPrice.description: The current price of the investment.

NetWorth.title: NetWorth
NetWorth.description: Represents the user's net worth at a point in time.

id.description: Unique identifier for the NetWorth record.

date.description: The date the net worth was calculated.

totalAssets.description: The total value of all assets.

totalLiabilities.description: The total value of all liabilities.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Owned by the user.

/users/{userId}/debts/{debtId}.description: Stores debt information for a user. Owned by the user.

/users/{userId}/transactions/{transactio.description: Stores transaction information for a user. Owned by the user.

/users/{userId}/obligations/{obligationI.description: Stores obligation information for a user. Owned by the user.

/users/{userId}/budgets/{budgetId}.description: Stores budget information for a user. Owned by the user.

/users/{userId}/budgets/{budgetId}/budge.description: Stores budget item information for a user. Owned by the user.

/users/{userId}/budgetCategories/{budget.description: Stores budget category information for a user. Owned by the user.

/users/{userId}/investments/{investmentI.description: Stores investment information for a user. Owned by the user.
